name: Black Diamond Spinner Leash
description: This lightweight tether prevents tool-loss when climbing leashless. It combines reasonable strength with good reach and no-tangle design. A big step up from homemade umbilicals.Polyester elasticized webbing stretches for maximum reach and absorbs less water than nylon.Steel mini clip attaches to spikes when climbing, or through the heads for plunging.Built-in swivel lets you cross and match tools without tangling.Rated to 2kN.
